title: Topic 001 Question 472
body: A company plans to run its IT infrastructure in the AWS Cloud. The infrastructure must be highly available. The company also must minimize the network latency between servers.
Which deployment scenario will meet these requirements?
options: Deploy in multiple Availability Zones in multiple AWS Regions.
Deploy in one Availability Zone in one AWS Region
Deploy in multiple AWS Regions. Deploy in one Availability Zone in each Region.
Deploy in multiple Availability Zones in one AWS Region.
